resources.string: What kind of information do we collect?
What do we do with the data we collect?
This privacy policy applies to all mobile applications for Android created by flottapps and published in the developer account with the name mentioned above.
For the proper functioning of the applications we build or develop, these are some of the data we collect:
In the case of applications that are necessary we access the data provided by the GPS. These data are not handled by us, they are directly managed by Google Maps (our map provider).

I want to inform you that every time you use my Service, in case of an application error, I collect data and information (through third-party products) on your phone called Registration Data. This registration data may include information such as the Internet Protocol («IP») address of your device, the name of the device, the version of the operating system, the application settings when using my Service, the time and date of Use of the Service and other statistics.

Cookies are files with a small amount of data that are commonly used as unique anonymous identifiers. These are sent to your browser from the websites you visit and stored in the internal memory of your device. This service does not use these cookies explicitly. However, the application may use third-party code and libraries that use cookies to collect information and improve its services. You have the option of accepting or rejecting these cookies and knowing when a cookie is sent to your device. If you choose to decline our cookies, you may not be able to use some parts of this Service.

I value your confidence in providing us with your personal information, therefore, we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect it. But remember that no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% safe and reliable, and I cannot guarantee its absolute security.

This service may contain links to other sites. If you click on a link from a third party, you will be directed to that site. Note that these external sites are not operated by me. Therefore, I recommend that you review the Privacy Policy of these websites. I have no control or assume any responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of third-party sites or services.

These Services are not directed to any person under 13 years old. I do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 13. In the event that I discover that a child under 13 has provided me with personal information, I immediately delete it from our servers. If you are a parent or guardian and know that your child has provided us with personal information, contact me so I can take the necessary actions.

The data collected are of two types:

 		• Data collected by us.
 		• Data collected by third parties.

This data is collected to obtain feedback on what our users want and thus be able to improve by providing the correct improvements in each update. The data is manipulated at the code level, then processed in large quantities, but at no time do we access data from a particular user, as they are encrypted and only the user who owns the information can access them.
In the data collected by third parties are:
You can configure the app in the drop-down menu that opens by swiping right the screen.
If you enjoy using the app, please rate us on Google Play!
